body_html:
translate.py uses GPU in not all the process. You should check the status of GPU by

%nvidia-smi

and

%top

when messages come out, or stopped. ( when running top, push "1" key to see every single CPU's performance).
Maybe you can see your GPU is running.

body:
translate.py uses GPU in not all the process. You should check the status of GPU by

%nvidia-smi

and

%top

when messages come out, or stopped. ( when running top, push "1" key to see every single CPU's performance).
Maybe you can see your GPU is running.
